description: Episode number 4 of Series "This Modern Age". This film stresses the plight of Britain's homeless in 1946, tracing its causes, and pointing the way to a possible solution to the problem. The growth of industries, with the consequent expansion of cities, and the age of jerry-building are dealt with in some detail.
